news.title: Vonovia CEO says capital increase less likely after property sale
news.para: Vonovia had said in recent months it had enough flexibility to avoid a capital increase, but market speculation that it may need to resort to such a measure had persisted.

news.title: GRAP III invoked, non-essential construction work banned in Delhi
news.para: The Centre's pollution control panel invoked the GRAP III on Thursday, directing a halt on non-essential construction work, stone crushing and mining in Delhi-NCR.

news.title: Noida administration says will enforce GRAP III, to ban construction
news.para: ​The ban will not be on exempted essential works but only on those where applicable, District Magistrate Manish Kumar Verma said, citing guidelines of the Centre's Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) in the National Capital Region and Adjoining Areas.

news.title: Evolving funding landscape for Indian real estate
news.para: Developers can leverage competitive advantages like access to huge funding to maintain healthy financial positions, working capital, cash flow management, and refinance debt for funding.

news.title: Chennai: Rs 800 crore worth plot in Kathipara recovered
news.para: The authorities managed to recover around 4.5 acres of state government land worth around 800 crore where commercial and residential buildings had stood for a few decades.

news.title: Over 27,000 property tax defaulters in Nashik city pay Rs 16 crore
news.para: The civic body officials said they are expecting the defaulters to clear at least Rs 50 to Rs 75 crore dues by the end of November.

news.title: Soon, township off Yamuna expressway to woo Japanese companies
news.para: The state cabinet recently approved the new FDI policy, including exemptions in land costs and stamp duties, as well as other concessions, which, officials hope, will attract more companies to establish factories.

news.title: Provident Housing in talks with HDFC Capital to raise over Rs 1,000 crore
news.para: The proposed fundraise will be in the form of equity and the money will be used to build mid-income homes in the southern markets of Bangalore, Chennai, and Hyderabad, and to enter new markets.

news.title: JK Lakshmi Cement's net profit up 55% to Rs 95.87 crore in Q2 FY24
news.para: JK Lakshmi Cement's revenue from operations was up 14.63 per cent to Rs 1,574.53 crore compared to Rs 1,373.55 crore in the year-ago period.

news.title: Skanska misses profit view as property market slump bites
news.para: The Nordic region's largest builder, which is also one of the biggest players in the United States, said operating profit fell to 549 million crowns ($49 million) from 1.52 billion a year ago, below a forecast of 1.58 billion, according to LSEG estimates.

news.title: Aptus Value Housing Finance's net profit up 20% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Aptus Value Housing Finance's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 344.46 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 24.33 per cent from Rs 277.05 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Asahi India Glass' net profit dips 17.23% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Asahi India Glass' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,122.58 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 10.12 per cent from Rs 1,019.39 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Surya Roshni's net profit up 11.71% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Surya Roshni's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,917.24 crore in Q2 FY24, a dip of 3.48 per cent from Rs 1,986.29 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Orient Bell posts net profit of Rs 69 lakh in Q2 FY24
news.para: Orient Bell's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 160.48 crore in Q2 FY24, a dip of 8.11 per cent from Rs 174.65 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Consumer forum directs Holy Faith Builders to pay couple whose flat was demolished on SC orders
news.para: The Commission said that the apex court had found that the apartment complex constructed by the builder was in violation of the law.

news.title: Berger Paints' net profit increases by 33% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Berger Paints' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 2,782.58 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 3.69 per cent from Rs 2,683.50 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Over 2,000 property tax defaulters under Chandigarh civic body's lens
news.para: “Most of the defaulters have failed to deposit the dues within the stipulated time period. As per Section 138 of the Municipal Act, the civic body can initiate attachment proceedings. We have identified 2,000 defaulters in terms of the amount pending and action will be initiated against them first,” said an official.

news.title: Akzo Nobel India's net profit up 44% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Akzo Nobel India's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 965.2 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 3.67 per cent from Rs 931 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Kanpur development body receives Rs 200 crore for New Kanpur City, housing project
news.para: Under the scheme, the Kanpur Development Authority has recieved Rs 200 crore of which Rs 150 crore would be spent on New Kanpur City Project and Rs 50 crore will be as the first instalment for Bingawan Housing project.

news.title: Godrej Properties' net profit grows by 8.37% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Godrej Properties' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 605.11 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 63.90 per cent from Rs 369.20 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.
